docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Home

docs.title: get_ticker()

docs.text: Class Ticker The abstruct data container of a symbol. history ( self , period = 'max' , interval = '1d' , start = None , end = None , ** kwargs ) Query the historical technical data of the symbol with period and sample interval. Parameters: Name Type Description Default period str One of '1d' | '5d' | '7d' | '60d' | '1mo' | '3mo' | '6mo' | '1y' | '2y' | '5y' | '10y' | 'ytd' | 'max'. Defaults to 'max'. 'max' interval str One of '1m' | '2m' | '5m' | '15m' | '30m' | '60m' | '90m' | '1h' | '1d' | '5d' | '1wk' | '1mo' | '3mo'. Defaults to '1d'. '1d' start str or datetime.datetime Start date of history. String parsed as '%Y-%m-%d'. Defaults to None. None end str or datetime.datetime End date of history. String parsed as '%Y-%m-%d'. Defaults to None. None Returns: Type Description DataFrame DataFrame: The historical technical data of the symbol. peers ( self ) Query peer symbols with correlation scores. Returns: Type Description List[Dict] List[Dict]: With format of [{'symbol': symbol, 'score': score}]
docs.title: Ticker

docs.text: The abstruct data container of a symbol.
docs.title: auguri.ticker.Ticker

docs.text: Query the historical technical data of the symbol with period and sample interval. Parameters: Name Type Description Default period str One of '1d' | '5d' | '7d' | '60d' | '1mo' | '3mo' | '6mo' | '1y' | '2y' | '5y' | '10y' | 'ytd' | 'max'. Defaults to 'max'. 'max' interval str One of '1m' | '2m' | '5m' | '15m' | '30m' | '60m' | '90m' | '1h' | '1d' | '5d' | '1wk' | '1mo' | '3mo'. Defaults to '1d'. '1d' start str or datetime.datetime Start date of history. String parsed as '%Y-%m-%d'. Defaults to None. None end str or datetime.datetime End date of history. String parsed as '%Y-%m-%d'. Defaults to None. None Returns: Type Description DataFrame DataFrame: The historical technical data of the symbol.
docs.title: history()

docs.text: Query peer symbols with correlation scores. Returns: Type Description List[Dict] List[Dict]: With format of [{'symbol': symbol, 'score': score}]
docs.title: peers()
